------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Español : 
Bienvenidos a Inti Eco Lodge Crowdfunding Fase 1 !  



« Estamos absolutamente seguros
de que usted puede encontrar un país pacífico unido en torno de un nuevo
proyecto de colaboración para un futuro mejor, la modernidad, el bienestar y el
respeto por el otro, en estrecha cooperación con el mundo. Dijo » Nicolas
Hulot, el periodista-reportero Frances con el compromiso de proteger y mejorar
la conciencia pública sobre el medio ambiente.
A través de este proyecto, queremos
promover y crear nuevos modelos de vida sostenibles con nuestros recursos y
nuestro medio ambiente. Nos gustaría lograr una combinación perfecta de vivir
en la naturaleza, en un hábitat inusual, ser respetuosos con el medio ambiente,
y al mismo tiempo, revitalizar el cuerpo y la mente.
Inti Eco Lodge Eco Lodge será el
primero en utilizar los conceptos de Earthship (casas ecológicas y
autosostenibles) en Perú y en la Amazonia. 
Compartimos y educamos a nuestros
clientes, sino también con nuestras comunidades vecinas y voluntarios de todo
el mundo, la cultura, los productos ecológicos y locales, el bienestar y la
espiritualidad.
Nuestro principal objetivo es crear
una experiencia única y auténtica, en un centro del bienestar no lucrativo, en
el corazón de la Amazonía peruana.

EL PROYECTO



Inti Eco Lodge será una alternativa
al turismo convencional en Perú. Vamos a invitar a la gente a venir a pasar su
estadia en este lugar especial de aprendizaje y el desarrollo personal. 
El
objetivo es construir un centro de bienestar sin fines de lucro, para crear una
comunidad basada en la autosuficiencia, donde cada uno puede vivir una vida
saludable, aprender a vivir de manera sostenible, diversión, relax, sanar,
desarrollar proyectos y expresar su creatividad.  
                                                                                                
El centro será 100% Eco Friendly!


Inti Eco Lodge ofrecerá diversas
actividades dedicadas al bienestar y el desarrollo individual, como el yoga, la
meditación, la danza y el masaje. Otras áreas estarán dedicadas al desarrollo
de la creatividad, como la pintura y la escultura, talleres de descubrimiento
de la medicina natural, cocina, jardinería, o cómo hacer crecer sus propias
frutas, verduras y plantas medicinales.


El centro estará equipado con una
piscina natural y los huéspedes pueden disfrutar de la pesca con los lugareños.
La Casa Larga "Maloca" (lugar sagrado) estará dedicada a las
ceremonias chamánicas para permitir que las personas interesadas puedan llegar
a un cierto nivel espiritual, o durante períodos de dieta y meditación.

Las tarifas de su estadia dependerá
del alojamiento, actividades y de su presupuesto, para que o lodge sea accesible
a todos! 
Varias opciones de alojamiento están disponibles: un dormitorio (con
dos camas y un espacio para la hamaca), bungalows básicos (con cama doble o dos
camas individuales,un aseo y un baño público) o superior (aseo y cuarto de baño
privados ) y casas de lujo en el árbol.

                             

                             

Ofrecemos una experiencia única para
todos los viajeros, turistas o personas en busca de sí mismo.El Lodge es una organización sin
fines de lucro, los beneficios serán donados a organizaciones no
gubernamentales, la reforestación, las comunidades circundantes, empleados,
tribus peruanas de protección y la vida silvestre. Algunos de los beneficios
también se utilizarán para mejorar y mantener el Lodge.

SOBRE NOSOTROS
Soy Anne, llegué a Perú hace tres
años, cuando yo tenía 25 años. Desde que era muy joven siempre he estado
fascinada por América del Sur y de la Amazonía, así que después de mis estudios
de negocios internacionales en París y luego de turismo internacional en
Australia.llegué a Perú para iniciar mi propia
agencia de viajes con eco-tours.


 La idea de Inti Eco Lodge venía de una
experiencia en Iquitos, en la Amazonía peruana. Fui allí para aprender sobre
las plantas medicinales y el chamanismo para juzgar su eficacia para tratar mi
depresión. Yo estaba en la selva durante 5 semanas con un chamán / curandero, haciendo
dietas de plantas. Esta experiencia me hizo bien y me dieron ganas de crear un
centro para ayudar a otros. 

En diciembre de 2013, volví a
Francia para encontrar a mi amiga Marion, una amiga de Australia. Ella me dijo
que iba a Nuevo México para ir a la Academia de Earthship y como yo quería
hacer mi Eco Lodge, pensé que sería genial si pudiéramos usar mi centro en uno
de sus proyectos.
Así que ella está en mi proyecto, en
la implementación de los principios de Earthship construcción: energía solar y
eólica, tratamiento de aguas residuales, el uso de materiales reciclados y
naturales, la captación de agua, la producción de alimentos.

                      

Regresé al Perú, y me compré un
terreno en Iquitos para lanzar Inti Eco Lodge. Empezamos el proyecto de
construcción en noviembre de 2014 y desde entonces, hemos hecho varios
edificios y tratamos de mejorar constantemente la condición del lugar con la
ayuda de voluntarios locales e internacionales.

CONSTRUCCION ECO RESPONSABLE
 Inti Eco Lodge se construirá
con los árboles del terreno y serán reemplazados inmediatamente. Utilizamos
materiales reciclados que se encuentran en Iquitos y sus alrededores. De hecho,
se tratará el agua de lluvia y utilizara en varias ocasiones, la energía solar
proporcionará la electricidad (fotovoltaica). 
Un invernadero y un espacio para la
permacultura serán productivos durante todo el año. También vamos a poner en
marcha un sistema de eliminación de aguas residuales (alcantarillado), que no
contaminan ni la tierra, ni los ríos y que permitirá el riego de los huertos
como frutas y verduras. 

            

Por lo tanto, el "agua negra" de fregaderos
de cocina (que contiene los residuos sólidos) irá directamente a la fosa
séptica, donde será procesada para luego alimentar la célula botánica exterior. 
Por el contrario, el "agua gris" (usada una vez) de las duchas y
lavabos regará los huertos de frutas y verduras del invernadero.
La piscina natural funcionará
mediante un sistema de bombas y dos piscinas, una para nadar y uno que
purificar el agua para la mineralización de la materia orgánica de las plantas
acuáticas.

INVERNADERO / AQUAPONICS / PERMACULTURE

Vamos a construir un invernadero
conveniente para el clima ecuatorial de la Amazonía peruana que producirá
frutas y verduras y el pescado durante todo el año.

Su construcción se cumplirá con los
tres principios de diseño sostenible:
- Earthship, vivienda sostenible
100% autosuficiente.

- Aquaponics, sistema simbiótico con
peces y plantas para cultivar alimentos.

- Invernadero solar pasivo,
absorbiendo el sol para maximizar la ganancia de calor solar.
Vamos a aplicar un concepto
fundamental de Earthship, las "aguas grises" de duchas y lavabos, una
vez purificadas, regara nuestros cultivos en invernaderos. El sistema de
reciclaje de agua permite no sólo ahorrar recursos, sino también para la
producción de alimentos más sanos y preservar el medio ambiente. Después de
unos años, su producción será beneficiosa tanto por su variedad como por su
calidad y será independiente. 


Con la ayuda de las comunidades, vamos a utilizar
el suelo y fertilizante para la permacultura y el crecimiento de las plantas
medicinales. 
El compuesto que nos permite que la fermentación de productos orgánicos se
incorpore en tierras agrícolas para enriquecerlas.

PLANTAS Y SHAMANISMO
Culturas Indígenas han desarrollado
un extraordinario conocimiento sobre las propiedades curativas de las plantas
medicinales, especialmente las purgativas, la curación y efectos visionarios
fueron llamados "plantas maestros", como Ayahuasca, Tabaco, sanango
Shiric, dedo del pie, Ajo Sacha, Oje, San Pedro ...
El misterio es de 80, 000 especies
de plantas en la Amazonía como chamanes descubrieron el uso medicinal de estas
combinaciones de plantas. 
Es su creencia, si cumplen ciertas
condiciones de aislamiento y siguen una dieta stricta, estas plantas son
capaces de "enseñar" a ellos para diagnosticar y curar enfermedades,
para realizar otras tareas chamánicas (profecía, la telepatía, la limpieza, la
curación) y cómo utilizar plantas medicinales, por lo general con melodías o
icaros.

                                       
 Iquitos es uno de los lugares más famosos donde se puede utilizar
plantas chamánicas con los profesionales, los chamanes o curanderos. Las
razones varían, pero hay algunos temas comunes. Una de ellas es la necesidad de
volver a conectar con el pasado antiguo, el deseo de continuar con el
conocimiento de la antigüedad o el deseo de estar más conectados con la
naturaleza y el mundo de los espíritus.
Para los interesados, ofrecemos
dietas y ceremonias con nuestros curanderos a través del uso de plantas para
entender y comunicar sus propiedades terapéuticas.

                            

VOLUNTARIOS Y TURISMO
Estamos construyendo el centro con
la ayuda de voluntarios de todo el mundo. Es una gran experiencia para reunir a
personas de diferentes orígenes, edades y profesiones, pero todos comparten el
mismo interés. Algunos no tienen conocimiento en la construcción, pero tienen
la voluntad de aprender y otros tienen experiencia y habilidades en la
construcción, la arquitectura, Biotecture o permacultura. No hay ningún
requisito para unirse a nosotros. 

                    


                     

Queremos pensar colectivamente y
recoger ideas con el fin de encontrar las soluciones más adecuadas y
sostenibles para ser un ejemplo. 
Juntos, podemos traer vida a este proyecto!

RELACION CON LAS COMUNIDADES VECINAS
El dinero recaudado se mejorará la
casa de campo y sus comunidades, sino que también para la reforestación, las
ONG y las tribus peruanas.
Vamos a intercambiar ideas con
nuestras comunidades sobre cómo construir de una forma más sostenible y cómo
vivir de manera sostenible. No es sólo acerca de la reutilización de materiales
reciclados, el desarrollo sostenible del suelo y el crecimiento de nuestra propia
comida, pero sobre todo el intercambio de conocimientos. 

                     

Quisieramos intercambiar
y enseñar una alternativa para el drenaje de residuos contaminantes de la
tierra y el Amazonas, al igual que los sanitarios secos, por ejemplo, y la
manera de contenerlo, depuración y distribución de aguas residuales. 
Vamos a
compartir el agua y las plantas
medicinales con las comunidades vecinas y promover la ayuda mutua. Ofrecemos
trabajo y alimentos. Así queremos mezclar nuestras comunidades, porque tenemos
mucho que aprender unos de otros. No estamos tratando de invadir su tierra e
industrializar, queremos en cambio nos volver a conectar con la naturaleza y
todo lo que tiene para ofrecer.



         

        

DONDE IRA EL DINERO?
Gracias por su increíble apoyo estos
últimos 5 meses. Nuestra página de Facebook Inti Eco Lodge ha habido una gran
demanda, ahora estamos con la participación de más de 6.000 personas. Fuimos
entrevistados por la revista online "Le Petit Journal" estamos en la
portada de la revista de viajes "Astrolabe" distribuida en 194 paises, tambien un artículo en la
revista francesa "Inexploré" llegara pronto y dos canales de televisión
peruanos llegarán en mayo para una estancia. 
Este es un gran éxito para
nosotros, y apreciamos el interés de los medios de comunicación internacionales
y, especialmente, la ayuda y el apoyo de los voluntarios.                                                                                                                                         
Es por eso que necesitamos de su ayuda a la Fase 1 de nuestra Campaña Indiegogo!

FASE 1:
Los fondos recaudados a través de nuestra campaña de Indiegogo seran:
En primer lugar, para garantizar un espacio seguro y cómodo para los voluntarios. Vamos a
proporcionar las instalaciones principales, como un dormitorio con dos camas,
una cocina y un comedor, un baño común y baños secos para todos. Necesitamos
barco de emergencia en caso de accidentes y socorristas para garantizar la
seguridad de los voluntarios, los constructores, vecinos e invitados en
cualquier momento. 
Despues, el dinero va a
comprar herramientas adicionales, trabajamos con más voluntarios de lo que
esperábamos.
Por último, el dinero va primero en el material y la construcción de la casa de
campo.

1- Equipos / voluntarios instalaciones:
- (Muebles foros + hojas + techo)
dormitorio 8,000 USD
- Cocina y equipos electrónicos:
5.000 USD
- Baño: 5.000 USD
- 6m barco: 1.500 USD
- Motor 30P: 4.000 USD
2- Herramientas: $ 1.000

3. Materiales y construcción:
- Electricidad (paneles solares,
baterías): 5.000 USD
- Un sistema de agua / tubería
(tanques, filtros, mangueras, bombas): 5.000 USD


- Invernadero: 8.000 USD
- Permacultura (plantas, semillas,
árboles, herramientas): 1.000 USD
- Base de Bungalow: 2.500 USD

FASE 1 TOTAL: 45 000 USD

Los fondos adicionales se destinarán a:

- Top Bungalows: 4.000 dólares cada
uno
- Individuales Bungalows extra: USD
2.500 cada uno
- Treehouse: 6.000 USD
- Casa Larga con la geometría sagrada
(para ceremonias): 10 000 USD
- El espacio de arte
- Piscina Natural (liner, plantas
naturales, bombas, alimentación externa): 10
000USD

ESTIMADO TOTAL DEL PROYECTO (Fase 1 y 2): 100 000 USD
Al hacer una donación, estará
involucrado en este proyecto, no sólo para ayudar a construir el centro y el
buen funcionamiento de nuestra vida cotidiana, sino también ayudar a los
voluntarios, las comunidades locales, las ONG y los planes de copia de
seguridad ambientales. Usted será capaz de seguir la evolución de su
contribución a través la página de Facebook y del sitio web! También puede disfrutar de sus
regalos!

                                       
Los Regalos NO son representativos
de los costos de futuras estancias en el lodge, es simplemente lo que se
obtiene cuando apoyan el proyecto con una donación!
Facebook
page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Inti-Eco-Lodge/681803555235511
Website:
www.intiecolodge.com  
Construction,
volunteers and neighboring communities pictures: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/set=a.715771968505336.1073741829.681803555235511&type=1
Le
Petit Journal Magazine: http://www.lepetitjournal.com/rio-de-janeiro/tourisme1/amerique-latine/197646-inti-eco-lodge-quand-une-francaise-s-installe-en-amazonie-pour-partager-son-amour-de-la-nature

story:
The Story

Enjoy the authentic feeling of driving a sports car with a WENCKSTERN© HotRod:

•  without air conditioning – but with more than enough fresh air
•  without manual transmission – yet you'll still be the first to start at the traffic light
•  without power steering – but with immediate feedback thanks to the sports car steering wheel
•  without all-wheel drive – yet with rear-wheel drive (even more fun!!!)
•  without a cd-player – yet the sound remains fantastic

The direct steering mechanism resulting in immediate feedback on road quality takes you right back to the good old times driving go-carts. The modest weight of the WENCKSTERN© with roughly 150 kilograms is easy on the breaks. Even though you're nearly seated on the ground and therefore basically eye-to-eye with the dogs on the sidewalk, the general appearance of the WENCKSTERN© easily beats any bigger vehicle. You'll never lag behind due to a maximum speed of 88 kilometers per hour!

The WENCKSTERN© is basically equipped as a single-seater with a 170 ccm engine combined with a  centrifugal clutch and reverse gearing. The engine performance of 13,6 HP (10 KW) along with the minimal overall weight of the vehicle ensures very good acceleration potential. Its' “petite” size turns the HotRod into a real eye-catcher – once you've seen it, you'll really want to try it out!

In careful and time-consuming manual labor, our HotRods are manufactured in the Wenckstern factory in Hamburg. The fact that the HotRods and the concept of HOTROD CITYTOUR are property right-registered as well as approved for usage in public traffic goes without saying.

You can find more information on our HotRods below...

In Gran Canaria, we solely offer guided tours with HotRods labeled by WENCKSTERN©. Now we're looking to expand our armada by two additional HotRods – and for that we need your help! Take the chance now with one of our “Early Bird Perks” and support our idea!

We intend to offer several types of guided round trips of various duration and length. Our longest tour intent as of yet takes the participants to the Roque Nublo; the highest mountain of Gran Canaria.  A stretch of around 100 kilometers can be enjoyed during the five hour round trip in the HotRod. Driving straight through the country, passing charming mountain villages far away from international tourism with several stops along the way make this trip unforgettable.

In addition to earnings made by our HotRod rental service, we earn money by selling of various merchandise, rental of unique hotrod advertising spaces, by direct hotrod sale and after sales services.

We're not the only ones this far! There are currently multiple “HOTROD CITYTOURS” being offered in Europe such as Berlin, Essen, Flensburg, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Coblenz, Constance, Munich, Salzburg, Stuttgart and Mallorca. In the second quarter of 2015, further City Tours will be launched in Bratislava, Duesseldorf, Goslar, Vienna and on the isles of Gran Canaria, Ibiza and Sylt (source: Wenckstern). Wenckstern grants each and every tour location territorial exclusivity. Alongside Gran Canaria, we've also secured the rights for Fuerteventura, Lanzarote and Tenerife.

Should we accumulate a total of more than 25.000 EUR, we will make use of our means by investing in even more new HotRods.

Other Ways You Can Help

Would you like to support our cause? You'd like to help but just can't commit by financial means? No problem! Please feel free to help spread our campaign. Tell your friends and family about us. Like and share our Facebook page. Also use the sharing tools here on the IndieGoGo page and include us in your social network platforms.

And in any case, if you are on vacation on Gran Canaria come along and get your picture taken in one of our WENCKSTERN© HotRods!

We're grateful for any kind of support! Thank you very much and see you soon,

Lars & Christian


Important Information

Tickets - Please let us know when you would like to cash your ticket as soon as possible. Send an email to booking@hotrods.es.

Photoshoot – We are happy to assist you with the selection process of various locations. Foil coating costs accumulate up to 1.000€ per HotRod depending on intended usage and extent.

Partial Foil Advertising – The visual representation of your advertisement will be placed on both sides of a HotRod for the duration of 2 months. We'll furthermore provide you with 20 photographs to use as you please. You'll be informed of the intended time frame in written form. The order of advertisement placement occurs according to receipt of payment. Costs for foil coating accumulate up to about 300€.

Full Foil Advertising – We'll fully brand a HotRod for the duration of an entire year. You'll receive 100 photographs to use as you please. You'll be informed of the intended time frame in written form. Costs for foil coating accumulate up to about 1.000€.

Needless to say each and every purchaser of a perk worth 70€ or more can be included on the HOTROD CITYTOUR Supporters web page if desired!


Unique Advertising With The HOTROD CITYTOUR Gran Canaria

Attention & Image

There are many ways to advertise, however, only very few actually have the desired overall impact. We offer mobilized advertizing spaces that cannot be missed – and have a high chance of being caught on picture or film. Once you catch a glimpse of our Rods you can't help but smile. It's not a rare occurrence to see tourists jump at the chance to catch our rods on film  and start up a conversation.

The „mini“ HotRods are closely designed and based on  models reminding you of the 50s in the USA. The youth of the 50s era clearly prioritized the fun factor while driving their rebellious vehicles. We have a similar approach when planning our tours by putting an emphasis on effortless entertainment – a proven popular approach!

Technical Data

All HOTROD CITYTOUR round trips are offered in the form of guided group tours including four to six vehicles. The various round trips along the island are divided according to tourist attractions (Hot-Spots) and safe usage in public traffic. Each round trip lasts two hours including detailed instructions on usage beforehand.

We provide an average of five round trips a day, summing up to about 10 hours of vehicle operation time as well as a total of 200 kilometers per day.

All of this adds up to more than 3.500 hours of operation and over 70.000 kilometers traveled for each HotRod each year!

Our Rods are mainly in action in the southern regions of the island (Playa de Inglés, Maspalomas). This is where the majority of the about three million tourists can be found.

Advertising With HOTROD CITYTOUR

Our classical advertising methods within our permanent round trips are generally characterized by full-surface foil coating and foil coating of partial surfaces. The minimum subscription duration lasts a total of 2 months in both cases. Of course, we offer additional advertising opportunities within our mobile rental stations such as partial foil coating, pamphlets, work clothing, web presence etc.

Cooperation & Sponsoring

Apart from advertisement, we're open to any kind of cooperation and sponsoring. Do you have a specific suggestion? Feel free to contact us.


All About The WENCKSTERN© HotRod


Contact

Feel free to contact us anytime without obligation. We'd love to discuss your varying possibilities with our HotRods:

mail
info@hotrods.es

phone
+49 173 910 87 05 (D)
+34 673 18 80 80 (ES)

HOTROD CITYTOUR Gran Canaria S.L.
C/ Tias 4
35100 San Fernando / Maspalomas

www.hotrods.es
story_txt:
The StoryEnjoy the authentic feeling of driving a sports car
with a WENCKSTERN© HotRod:
• 
without air conditioning – but with more than enough
fresh air• 
without manual transmission – yet you'll still be the
first to start at the traffic light• 
without power steering – but with immediate feedback
thanks to the sports car steering wheel• 
without all-wheel drive – yet with rear-wheel drive
(even more fun!!!)• 
without a cd-player – yet the sound remains fantastic

The direct steering mechanism resulting in immediate
feedback on road quality takes you right back to the good old times driving
go-carts. The modest weight of the WENCKSTERN© with roughly 150 kilograms is easy on the breaks.
Even though you're nearly seated on the ground and therefore basically
eye-to-eye with the dogs on the sidewalk, the general appearance of the
WENCKSTERN©
easily beats any bigger vehicle. You'll never lag behind due to a maximum speed
of 88 kilometers per hour!
The WENCKSTERN© is basically equipped as a single-seater with a 170
ccm engine combined with a  centrifugal
clutch and reverse gearing. The engine performance of 13,6 HP (10 KW) along
with the minimal overall weight of the vehicle ensures very good acceleration potential.
Its' “petite” size turns the HotRod into a real eye-catcher – once you've seen
it, you'll really want to try it out!
In careful and time-consuming manual labor, our HotRods are manufactured in the Wenckstern factory in Hamburg. The fact
that the HotRods and the concept of HOTROD CITYTOUR are property right-registered as well as approved for usage in public
traffic goes without saying.
You can find more information on our HotRods below...
In Gran Canaria, we solely offer guided tours with HotRods labeled by WENCKSTERN©. Now we're looking to expand our armada by two
additional HotRods – and for that we need your help! Take the chance now with
one of our “Early Bird Perks” and support our idea!
We intend to offer several types of guided round trips
of various duration and length. Our longest tour intent as of yet takes the
participants to the Roque Nublo; the highest mountain of Gran Canaria.  A stretch of around 100 kilometers can be
enjoyed during the five hour round trip in the HotRod. Driving straight through
the country, passing charming mountain villages far away from international tourism
with several stops along the way make this trip unforgettable.
In addition to earnings made by our HotRod rental
service, we earn money by selling of various merchandise, rental of unique
hotrod advertising spaces, by direct hotrod sale and after sales services. 
We're not the only ones
this far! There are currently multiple “HOTROD CITYTOURS” being offered in
Europe such as Berlin, Essen, Flensburg, Frankfurt, Hamburg, Coblenz, Constance, Munich,
Salzburg, Stuttgart and Mallorca. In the second quarter of 2015, further City
Tours will be launched in Bratislava, Duesseldorf, Goslar, Vienna and on
the isles of Gran Canaria, Ibiza and Sylt (source: Wenckstern). Wenckstern
grants each and every tour location territorial exclusivity. Alongside Gran
Canaria, we've also secured the rights for Fuerteventura, Lanzarote and
Tenerife.
Should we accumulate a total of more than 25.000 EUR, we will make use of our means by investing in even more new HotRods.Other Ways You Can Help
Would you like to support our
cause? You'd like to help but just can't commit by financial means? No problem!
Please feel free to help spread our campaign. Tell your friends and family about
us. Like and share our Facebook page. Also use the sharing tools here on the
IndieGoGo page and include us in your social network platforms.
And in any case, if you are on
vacation on Gran Canaria come along and get your picture taken in one of our WENCKSTERN©
HotRods!
We're grateful for any kind of
support! Thank you very much and see you soon,
Lars
& Christian

story:
Our Mission Statement

USA Cares exists to help bear the burdens of service by providing post-9/11 military families with financial and advocacy support in their time of need.

Our History

USA Cares is committed to its mission to provide financial and advocacy assistance to post-9/11 active duty U.S. military service personnel, veterans and their families.  USA Cares was launched through a grassroots partnership between the management of WAVE-3 TV (NBC) in Louisville, Kentucky; Kroger Food Stores – Mid-South Division; and the Fort Knox Chapter of the Association of the United States Army.  The organization was dubbed Kentuckiana Cares with a goal to raise funds to help military families in financial crisis through the sale of “Support Our Troops” yard signs.  While $121,000 was raised, the need for assistance proved to be greater than the original initiative could meet.  However, we could not quit on our nation’s heroes or their families. In October 2003, a new 501(c)(3), national organization now known as USA Cares was created with a toll-free call center to process the increasing number of requests for assistance.

Our Goal:

Our goal is to help restore financial stability and self-sufficiency by giving “a hand up.” We strive to reach families at the earliest stage of intervention to prevent further financial distress and suffering, especially for the combat injured and their families.

HQ SPONSORSHIP

USA Cares has been given a generous donation of property which is located in Radcliff, Kentucky, located just outside the main entrance of Fort Knox.

This site will serve as the new headquarters for USA Cares.  The new facility will be approximately 8,800 square feet on the top level with an additional 4,800 square feet on the lower level. When completed, the plans are to use the lower level of the building as a Training Center.  ABC (Associated Builders and Contractors) will provide training and education for US military service personnel reentering civilian life so that they can have the necessary skill sets to enter the construction industry.

BRICK CAMPAIGN

Be a part of USA Cares History!  USA Cares will engrave your message on a brick, which will become a permanent part of the USA Cares exterior landscape.  Bricks will be located around the West, South and East areas of the grounds.  You may personalize your brick with a name, a special date, a quote or the name of your company or club.

There will be two sizes of bricks available for purchase. Brick sizes are 4” x 8” with three lines of text (16 characters) at a cost of $125 or a 8” x 8” brick with up to six lines of text (20 characters per line) at a cost of $250. Both bricks will have a 1/16” inscription depth.

Once you have made your contribution to the campaign you will be contacted via email for your inscription.

All donors to the brick campaign will be recognized online on our virtual brick wall.  


Why a new building?

Have you seen our old building?

  • USA Cares has helped over 65,000 families with over $11,500,000
  • We need a new call center.
  • Everything has been donated except for the bricks.

story:
" Mentoring is a brain to pick , an ear to listen, and a push in the right direction." - John C. Crosby 

Some youth have lost faith in themselves and in the possibility to experience the opportunities ahead due to failures and negative influences. Good Karma aims to provide resources to help at-risk youth redirect their life choices, and all youth who have a desire to be successful or who are uncertain about their career path. To be successful, youth must identify with someone who actually cares about their success in life. In other words, everyone needs a mentor.

Good Karma Services, Inc. is a nonprofit transformative leadership program, providing resources and leadership for youth between the ages of 9-18 in Johnston County. The program will promote pro-social friendships, strong interpersonal skills, and professional etiquette, thereby bringing a sense of hope for the future. Through the development of interpersonal relationships, this program will bring a sense of individual responsibility that can be taken into adulthood with pride and self-accomplishment.  Our guiding principles are:

1. Mentorring and Coaching

2. Educational Opportunities

3. Professional Etiquette

4. Career Placement  


Good Karma Services is a program that strives to build a foundation to counteract such conditions as increases in teenage pregnancy, juvenile crime, high school dropouts, and indecision about career paths. As stated earlier, the goal of our business is to recognize youth who are trying to make a positive transition into adulthood and provide a great support system to avoid pitfalls that could possibly hinder their future success. The emphasis is targeted toward specific age groups, but the overall goal remains the same: to empower and nurture youth to make positive gains in their life.  In society today, youth are exposed to influences through technology, music, and dysfunctional parenting, often demonstrated through negative behavior, with damaging long-term consequences.  Youth today are imprisoned to their electronic devices and can sing and rap lyrics to popular songs, yet perform poorly in academics.

What We Need

Good Karma Services , Inc. is seeking monetary assistance in order to access the resources needed to offer this program successfully. This campaign will provide the money for everything needed from an brick and mortar facility to full operation of the program.  

A little about me: I am a junior at the prestigious Fayetteville State University, majoring in Business Administration with a concentration in Entrepreneurship. I am also enrolled at Fayetteville Technical Community College in the Funeral Service Directors Program. As a student,  I have some financial restraints that will not allow me to fully service this program in the startup stage. In order to achieve our vision and objectives, we are seeking financial support. 

My Challenge 

As a young adult who is not financially wealthy, my challenge merely rests with my lack of financial support. Not only am I seeking financial support, I am also looking for volunteers and most importantly, participants. Please contact me at (919) 410-9562 and by email goodkarmaservices01@gmail.com


My passion for this work can be summed up with the following quote:
" The delicate balance of mentoring someone is not creating them in your own image, but giving them the opportunity to create themselves. " - Steven Spielberg 

Thanks for your consideration!

story:
Who We Are

The Community Doula Birth Program (CDBP) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit that provides free or reduced cost doula services to low-income pregnant women and their families in the Greater Portland area by connecting doulas-in-training with families in need. We provide services to MaineCare participants, families experiencing financial hardship, refugees, immigrants, and more. Doulas-in-training are matched with experienced mentors who provide support through the course of their services. For example, we have worked with a woman who moved from Burundi while 8 months pregnant and living in a hotel room, and a family whose father was laid off, and their home went into foreclosure, all within 4 months before the baby was due. Our program is designed to mentor and match new doulas with these families. 

 So, what is a doula? 

A doula provides physical, emotional, and educational support to  pregnant women and their partners. Doulas work with each family prenatally to prepare for the birth, they stay with the mother for the duration of the labor and they assist with the postpartum adjustment. 

Doulas encourage, normalize, massage, coach, and act as a living resource. Doulas make a great team with partners supporting the laboring mother.  They bear witness to the amazing transformation that is birth.  Studies have shown that doulas increase the likelihood of a mother having a better birth experience!


Project Goals

We are launching this campaign to raise the funds needed for us to start offering services to low-income families in Maine. We need financial resources for start-up costs such as website development, logistical infrastructure, and getting the word out about our program through marketing materials. This fundraiser will contribute to the functioning of our program for the next year. All contributions are tax-deductible. 

If we are able to raise more than $10,000, the additional funds will go towards providing postpartum doula services to single, low-income women who have little to no support after their delivery.

If we are able to surpass our goal of $15,000, we will begin a scholarship fund to train participants of our program as doulas to provide services within their community. Immigrants and refugees settling in the Greater Portland area will have priority.

story:
Acknowledging God

The Scripture says, “Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.” (Psalms 37:5) “In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.” (Proverbs 3:6) “13 Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain: 14 Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away. 15 For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that. (James 4:13-15)

"With God All Things Are Possible"

  • By the Grace of God, we are able to present to you Project Genesis. To understand this project we must understand purpose, vision. And part of the vision for this project is to raise the given goal limit, in order to blessed with new supplies for this year.
  • Project Genesis is for the elevation of Genesis One Eleven. Genesis One Eleven is a Christian based Lawn and Landscaping Service, whereby its name comes from The Bible Verse Genesis 1:11. Which declares, “And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in itself, upon the earth: and it was so.” Thus the project is named Project Genesis, a project of new beginning.
  • If God permit. We hope to achieve our expectation from God, with the blessing to receive new equipment. And not just the natural, but also spiritual maturity in God. We also must understand what The Lord said, “Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.” (Mark 9:23)

Goal and Distribution

  • In this campaign the goal is set to $80,000 which will be enough for us to use for the business alone. Whereby with these funds we will bless The Lord, "Honour the Lord with thy substance, and with the firstfruits of all thine increase:" (Proverbs 3:9). And solely and entirely for the business use of Genesis One Eleven. You can view the supply list, showing what equipment we are trying to purchase. Then there is the distribution chart, which shows statistics on how the funds will be distributed. Even if we don’t reach what we are desiring, we still will give God the glory for what is received.
  • Then for those who contribute to this cause, there are perks which can be chosen when contributing which will be Genesis One Eleven branded items. If God permit.

The Mission and The Blessing

  • Genesis One Eleven is envisioned to be a Christian Lawn and Landscaping Service that operates in both residential and commercial properties. And not just operate as any service, but a service where God gets all the Glory. And in the services we respect people, and give low prices, yet acceptable quality. "The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat." (Proverbs 13:4)

  • As of now our team includes Hayden Blankenship, Anfernee Person, and Philip Baker. If the Lord will. These will be the forerunners for Genesis One Eleven this year. These workers will start off with $7.77 an hour. And the plan is to operate in 5 to 7 properties a day, six days a week. You can also view our minimum monthly goal plan, to see what we envisioned to accomplish at the least this business year. Moreover, we look to operate in Northeastern Arkansas in the Counties of Jackson and Craighead until God gives us the Grace to be mature in the blessing. If God permit.

Risks & Challenges

We believe the challenges ahead and risks are just tests, which come to improve our efforts and motives. We also know that as long as we apply ourselves to The Lord and honoring Him in business. And following Jesus’ Guidance, and learning what we can do better. "This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success." (Joshua 1:8)

  • Even so we don’t want to risk a good name for ourselves, and even Genesis One Eleven, but we want to have The Grace to continue year to year. “A good name is rather to be chosen than great riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.” (Proverbs 22:1) Moreover, we will commit ourselves to the way of The Lord, whereby we can also be vessels He can use when engaging others. And also committing ourselves to business obligations concerning law and Genesis One Elevens’ elevation.

Prayer and Support

We ask for your support in prayer and supplication. Please intercede on our behalf’s and Genesis One Eleven. That our hearts and our minds be equipped, with the knowledge, wisdom, yeah even understanding were Genesis One Eleven can flourish. We would like for this to grow and become something good, serious. Even we ask that you share this on facebook, twitter, youtube, google plus, and by word. If God Permit. Be blessed, and we appreciate your time.

If God permit. Please contact us for more information concerning this Project Genesis or Genesis One Eleven. Also feel free to leave a comment or a word of advice. Thank you God Bless.

(If the Lord will. Be sure to check the updates for exclusive offers.)
story_txt:
Acknowledging
God
The
Scripture says, “Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall
bring it to pass.” (Psalms 37:5) “In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall
direct thy paths.” (Proverbs 3:6) “13 Go to now, ye that say, To day or to
morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and
sell, and get gain: 14 Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For
what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and
then vanisheth away. 15 For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall
live, and do this, or that. (James 4:13-15)
"With
God All Things Are Possible"

By the Grace of God, we are able to present to you
     Project Genesis. To understand this project we must understand purpose,
     vision. And part of the vision for this project is to raise the given goal
     limit, in order to blessed with new supplies for this year.
Project Genesis is for the elevation of Genesis One
     Eleven. Genesis One Eleven is a Christian based Lawn and Landscaping
     Service, whereby its name comes from The Bible Verse Genesis 1:11. Which
     declares, “And God said, Let the earth bring forth grass, the herb yielding
     seed, and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind, whose seed is in
     itself, upon the earth: and it was so.” Thus the project is named Project
     Genesis, a project of new beginning.
If God permit. We hope to
     achieve our expectation from God, with the blessing to receive new
     equipment. And not just the natural, but also spiritual maturity in God. We
     also must understand what The Lord said, “Jesus said unto him, If thou
     canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.” (Mark 9:23)

Goal
and Distribution

In this campaign the goal is set to $80,000 which will
     be enough for us to use for the business alone. Whereby with these funds we
     will bless The Lord, "Honour the Lord with thy substance, and with
     the firstfruits of all thine increase:" (Proverbs 3:9). And solely
     and entirely for the business use of Genesis One Eleven. You can view the supply list, showing what equipment we
     are trying to purchase. Then there is the distribution     chart, which shows statistics on how the funds will be distributed. Even
     if we don’t reach what we are desiring, we still will give God the glory
     for what is received.
Then for those who contribute to this cause, there are
     perks which can be chosen when contributing which will be Genesis One
     Eleven branded items. If God permit.

The Mission and The Blessing

Genesis One Eleven is envisioned to
be a Christian Lawn and Landscaping Service that operates in both residential
and commercial properties. And not just operate as any service, but a service
where God gets all the Glory. And in the services we respect people, and give
low prices, yet acceptable quality. "The soul of the sluggard desireth,
and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat."
(Proverbs 13:4)
As of now our team includes Hayden
Blankenship, Anfernee Person, and Philip Baker. If the Lord will. These will be
the forerunners for Genesis One Eleven this year. These workers will start off
with $7.77 an hour. And the plan is to operate in 5 to 7 properties a day, six
days a week. You can also view our minimum monthly
goal plan, to see what we envisioned to accomplish at the least this
business year. Moreover, we look to operate in Northeastern Arkansas in the
Counties of Jackson and Craighead until God gives us the Grace to be mature in
the blessing. If God permit. 

Risks
& Challenges
We believe the
challenges ahead and risks are just tests, which come to improve our efforts
and motives. We also know that as long as we apply ourselves to The Lord and
honoring Him in business. And following Jesus’ Guidance, and learning what we
can do better. "This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth;
but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do
according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way
prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success." (Joshua 1:8)

Even so we don’t want to risk a good name for
     ourselves, and even Genesis One Eleven, but we want to have The Grace to
     continue year to year. “A good name is rather to be chosen than great
     riches, and loving favour rather than silver and gold.” (Proverbs 22:1) Moreover,
     we will commit ourselves to the way of The Lord, whereby we can also be
     vessels He can use when engaging others. And also committing ourselves to
     business obligations concerning law and Genesis One Elevens’ elevation.

Prayer
and Support
We ask for your support in prayer and
supplication. Please intercede on our behalf’s and Genesis One Eleven. That our
hearts and our minds be equipped, with the knowledge, wisdom, yeah even
understanding were Genesis One Eleven can flourish. We would like for this to
grow and become something good, serious. Even we ask that you share this on facebook,
twitter, youtube, google plus, and by word. If God Permit. Be blessed, and we appreciate
your time.
If God permit. Please contact us for more information concerning this Project Genesis or Genesis One Eleven. Also feel free to leave a comment or a word of advice. Thank you God Bless.
(If the Lord will. Be sure to check the updates for exclusive offers.)

story:
Viajar es vida

Mi nombre es Abel Peña Oller, soy un joven de 25 años y estoy apunto de emprender la aventura mas emocionante de toda mi vida!

Hace alrededor de 7 meses tuve una gran idea, estaba en uno de esos momentos donde ves que tu vida entra en la monotonía, que cada día es igual que el anterior, esperando simplemente a que llegue el fin de semana para sentirte bien.

Así que decidí que era hora de marcar un antes y un después, decidí que quería ver mundo, caminar por senderos y contemplar los paisajes ocultos en este bello planeta, pero que no somos capaces de apreciar debido a la globalización.

Desde ese momento he estado planeando esta increíble aventura, preparándome y ahora se acerca el momento!

Partiré desde mi casa junto a mi fiel compañero Tas, un labrador de 9 meses de edad, junto al que recorreré el sendero GR-4 que lleva hasta Puigcerdá, de allí me dirigiré cruzando las montañas hacia Perpiñan, el siguiente punto del recorrido será Carcassonne, y de allí tomare la ruta E7, que cruza Francia en dirección Suiza, que será el final del recorrido. Aunque no tiene que ser el final de mi aventura, pues si el viaje a dado sus frutos y consigo los fondos suficientes mi siguiente destino puede ser un recorrido por Nueva Zelanda!!

El objetivo

Poder viajar andando desde mi casa hasta suiza, recorrer los fantásticos senderos y poder mostraros a todos los que me sigáis cada etapa de mi aventura!
Pues voy a ir grabando día a día todo lo que vea relevante por el camino, en formato de videoblogs iré subiendo videos a mi canal de Youtube ' Lancedl ' tan seguidamente como me sea posible mientras este en camino. 
También iré escribiendo una series de blogs Viajar Es Vida, e iré subiendo fotos a mi  Galería con tal de que podáis seguir el transcurso de mi viaje!
Los blogs me servirán como notas para un libro que iré escribiendo durante mi viaje, podéis saber mas acerca del libro en mi web lancedl.com

Tu puedes ser participe de ello!

El viaje dará comienza el 11 de Mayo. Aunque la financiación del viaje ya esta clara, vuestra colaboración en este proyecto será crucial!

Pues con vuestra ayuda podré contar con mejor equipo para llevar a cabo mi objetivo. Material que para realizar el viaje es prescindible, pero que es necesario si quiero poder grabar grandes escenas de la mejor forma posible! Y solo con vuestra ayuda lo podré conseguir.
Actualmente cuento con mi iPhone6 Plus para grabar todo el viaje, pero con un poco de ayuda podré hacerme con una cámara de acción y con ella grabar escenas como la visión de mi compañero de viaje Tas, o escenas acuáticas en algún río del camino... O un disco duro externo para poder guardar todo el contenido que grabe, o una batería solar extra para no quedarme sin batería en ninguno de mis accesorios... 
Son muchas cosas que sin vuestra colaboración no será posible realizar. 

Que te llevas tu?

Con vuestra colaboración, dado que me ayudara a financiar el viaje, tecnológicamente hablando, yo me comprometeré a devolveros ese apoyo en la mejor forma que sea posible. Ya sea con un obsequio de alguna ciudad que visite, o con postales o fotos exclusivas enviadas por privado, videos extras de agradecimiento, avances exclusivos de los borradores de mi libro y muchas cosas mas!

El viaje 

Un viaje de más de 1300Km solo con tu perro?

Si esa es la clave, viajare solo junto a mi fiel compañero Tas, así que no tengo una fecha limite o unos plazos ara terminar el recorrido, por lo que puedo creer oportuno quedarme en algún sitio interesante ya sea por motivos de cansancio, por el libro, o por los videos... 
El camino lo terminaré, iré despacio y disfrutando de cada instante de mi viaje, pues no hay mejor sensación que la de no sentirse atado y caminar libremente por esos bellos parajes.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no posees medios para colaborar económicamente, no te preocupes!

Ayudarme a difundir mi aventura, eso es mas que suficiente para mi!
Comparte mi aventura, mi web, mis videos a todos tus amigos! 

Y no lo olvides si te gusta viajar pero no puedes disfrutar del tiempo que esto requiere, sígueme en mi aventura y disfruta a mi lado de este apasionante viaje que esta apunto de comenzar!

Nos vemos en el camino.

story:
Short Summary

According to the UNESCAP statement in 2003, PWDs population is mostly 7% of the total population in Sri lanka. AF believe this more than is number of people live in the division due to war and internal displacement and some of the family did not share to any sector due to the respect of the family.And also social factors such as religious beliefs, cultural attitudes and societal & family expectations are leads to the neglect of these vulnerable people hampering the development of their God-given potentials.

 Arumbugal Foundation (AF) was formed in 2012 to create job opportunities for handicapped. AF was launched a project Called "Sea the Differences" with the financial support of USAID in 2012 end. The main part of the project is to produce the handicrafts from natural/Waste material such as Sea shell, Coconut shell, Paper...etc and market it to locally and in the tourism sector.

Presently we have 50 employees (50% handicapped and 50% members poor family) in the existing production centre to producing the handicraft. The revenue will cover the operational cost and now we are continue the production with our own revenue since June 2014 with out any support from outside.

Unfortunately we unable to reached the market demand of the product. Around 50% only we are producing because of the capabilities of the handicapped who are with us in the production . In 2015 AF aim to reach the market demand 100% through increasing the production. Therefore AF decided to expand the 2nd production centre with another 50 employees. Fortunately AF has their own land but our financial situation unable to construct the production center.

What We Need & What You Get

AF expect 10,500USD for your contribution. It will be utilize to construct the 2nd production centre in AF own land. Furniture, Equipments and operational cost will be cover By AF from the revenue. Establishment of the 2nd Production centre will support to create 50 jobs among the handicapped, reached the market demand 100%, AF revenue will increase and the life style of the handicapped clanged to positively.

The Impact

AF existing project was blast all the berries and thoughts about the handicapped among the community. Now AF facilitate to open the opportunity for them for their independent life. it's proof the interest of the parents increased sending their handicapped to AF production center. Presently the existing employees earning from 40 USD to 80 USD in Monthly basis according to their productivity. Their income also contibuting for their family.

The new production centre will create another 50 job oportunities, Reached the market demand 100% and will improve their family style too.

AF will support each family, to setup an accessbility for handicaped in the house hold level from the profit of the business.

Risks & Challenges

Low regular attendance of the handicaped to the production centre is a big challenge this project. It will affect the production. But AF allow to do the production in home based with family members. It's mean bring the raw material from production centre to home and make the production their then back it to the Production.

Other Ways You Can Help

AF would like to thanks every bodies had a look on our campaign. and kindly request to contribute your valuable contribution such as financial support, sharing the campaign with friends, and sharing other linkages....etc

story:
Vapers across America!  

Remember where the indoor e-cig ban started?  In New York.  Yes, New York.  NY is a bellwether state, so what happens here will cascade across the country.

As a vaper, you will not have access to the products you have grown to love AND your favorite vape shop will likely close.  Are you ready to go back to harmful tobacco cigarettes?

Vapers! Help business owners fight to save vaping.

Here's what you can do:

Proactive NY vape shops have teamed up with national trade organizations and quite frankly, we need your support to raise funds to hire lobbyists and raise awareness through marketing campaigns.  Please Contribute!

Lobbying is the ONLY way your government will listen! Everyone with an interest in vaping needs to band together - this may be our last chance to fight the corruption and infringement on your freedom to vape.

There are 13 bills in detail below that threaten the entire vape industry:

1.  AB635 -Asw. Linda Rosenthal (D-NY) (full text here) Prohibits sales of any quantity of an e-liquid.

2.  AB296 –Jeffrey Dinowitz (D-NY) (full text here) Labels e-cigarette cartridges as “tobacco” for the purpose of taxation

3.  SB702 - Sen. Gustavo Rivera (D-NY)(full text here)Senate sister bill to AB 296

4.  SB7202 - Sen. Gustavo Rivera (D-NY) (full text here) Labels anything containing tobacco or nicotine “tobacco product” for the purpose of taxation unless approved by the FDA as smoking cessation product.

5.  A1496 - Asw. Linda Rosenthal (D-NY) Full text here) Prohibits use of vaporization products in certain areas (where smoking is prohibited), increases purchasing age of tobacco and electronic cigarettes from 18 to 21; directs Dept. of Health to evaluate the health effects of electronic cigarettes on the public.

6.  S 684 -  Sen. Patrick Gallivan (R-NY) full text here)Requires the presentation of ID and use of verification software to scan and securely store purchasers’ photo ID for the purchase of tobacco products and alcoholic beverages if under age 25. Signage in store (white w/red letters at least 1/2” high); All products must be kept behind a container or locked container unless premises are restricted to people 18 years or older.

7.  A852 -  Asw. Linda Rosenthal (D-NY) ,  Dinowitz (full text here) Requires sellers of electronic cigarettes to register with the department of taxation and finance. Department to create a registry to ensure compliance

8.  A237 - Asw. Linda Rosenthal (D-NY)  Rivera (D-NY)  (full text here) Increases the  purchasing age for tobacco products from eighteen to twenty-one
9.  A2221 - Asm. Richard Gottfried (D-NY) (full text here) amends the public health law and the tax law, to define tobacco  products;  and  to amend  the  public health law and the tax law, in relation to changing the minimum pack sizes for tobacco products and  the  tax  amount  for  tobacco products

10.  A1743 - Asm. J. Gary Pretlow (D-NY) (full text here) Relates to the sale of tobacco products over the internet; requires companies selling tobacco products over the internet to first send a form to individuals to sign stating that such individual is eighteen years of age or older and upon receipt of such form, the company may send the tobacco products if such person is over the requisite age.

11.  AB2595 -Asw. Linda Rosenthal (D-NY) (full text here) Amends the public health law, in relation to including electronic cigarettes within  provisions  regulating  smoking  in  certain public areas
12.  SB2202 - Sen. Kemp Hannon (R-NY) (full text here) Makes the restrictions relating to smoking in public areas applicable to electronic cigarettes; and requires retailers of electronic cigarettes, not otherwise registered with the department of taxation and finance to sell tobacco products, to register with the department of health.
13.  NY 25149 2015 – Rule Review, Dept of Taxation & Finance (full text here) Reviews rules concerning informational returns for wholesale dealers of cigarettes and tobacco products. Forces shop owners to report informational returns quarterly.

....And there's more that you can do:

For further action, visit National Vapers Club's NY State engagement page. You'll find information on state and federal bills and who is sponsoring them, plus easy access to call/write/tweet/meet with YOUR legislator.

National Vapers Club Link

THANK YOU

We thank you for your support and appreciate any donations.  Vape ON!

Beyond Vape, Brooklyn Vaper, Cherry Vape, City Vape, Henley Vaporium, Vape NY, Vapor World, White Plains Vapor

story:
We finally found an apartment now we need moving money. We are struggling to get our family back to New York City. We need packing supplies and moving truck cost from upstate NY . We are so ready to come home even if you can help with a dollar anything helps. we have been traveling back and forth on the bus with our daughter to view apartments and are so ready to not have to travel back any more.
Help us come home please
story_txt: We finally found an apartment now we need moving money. We are struggling to get our family back to New York City. We need packing supplies and moving truck cost from upstate NY . We are so ready to come home even if you can help with a dollar anything helps. we have been traveling back and forth on the bus with our daughter to view apartments and are so ready to not have to travel back any more. Help us come home please

story:
There are women all over the world who suffer with image related issues. These issues effect their self-esteem, self- confidence, and the way they greet the world. It is my desire to help these women with image recovery and to teach them how to maintain their external beauty in a way that allows them to build their internal worth.  The services that I will provide these women will not only help them see themselves in a different light but will assist with food, clothing, and peer counseling. The services will also assist them in developing a whole new since of worth; a since of worth that will give them the confidence they need to greet the world with a smile. The funds raised will also be used to provide manicures, facials, and hair grooming techniques at very little to no cost. I will also provide services for those in need of treatments for skin damage and for those who have lost their lashes. 

I have over 20 years in the beauty business and I'm a licensed Cosmetologist, Master Nail Technician, and Certified Lash Artist. I'm professional, enthusiastic, and a creative soul that is dedicated to enriching the lives of others by making them beautiful. I specialize in hair care, lash extensions, manicures, pedicures, reflexology, pressure points, acrylic and gel nails.

story:
Short Summary

Established in 2003, DC United Travelling Basketball Team, operates under the Durham City Basketball Association. As one of the premier clubs in the Ontario Basketball Association, our aim is to INSPIRE, ENHANCE, and EMPOWER players to reach their maximum level of ability regardless of economic status.
DC United is an elite basketball program who strives to provide the highest level of competition to our athletes. Our teams will participate in the National Youth Basketball League (NYBL). Over the next three months our players will travel to Washington, Tennessee, Ohio and Chicago to compete against the best middle school players across America, which provides maximum exposure for our players and a unique experience that will enhance the development of our coaches and players.

This forum is one of the funding options we are using to generate financial support for the basketball program in order to provide current and future players with meaningful life experiences. Our costs include, but not limited to:

  • Transportation costs for players and coaches (coach bus, travel insurance, meals).
  • Participation fees (tournament fees, etc.)

The Impact

As a sponsor you will enable our team to attend all three venues in the United States of America. The financial burden on each parent will be less, which enables the association to give each player an opportunity to participate: No Player Left Behind.

  • Time and time again, we have seen grades improve and our players attitudes towards authority change from oppositional to respectful behaviour.
  • Increased focus on school work, tests, and exams.
  • The ability to make new friends and participate in an extracurricular activity.

Risks & Challenges

 There are many financial obstacles to overcome, but we at The Durham City Basketball Association believe that: Where there is a will, there is a way.

Other Ways You Can Help

 We appreciate any assistance you can offer to our players. The Durham Basketball Association accepts donations and sponsorships in all forms, and we would appreciate any support you can give to us.

story:
My Goal 

In my life I've always wanted to start a business on my own, Coming from a hard life where my parents work hard to feed 7 of us I'm proud to say that I always stood out because I was a child who always wanted to do things all by my self without bothering my parents (Since they have more little sisters to look after).

And so I started working in early stages of my life and found out that even though I got the skills in me I did not like to work Under any one. (Bosses creeps me out) But then My Fiance and I plus two other partners started a business "The Residence Nilaveli" a budget hotel and I am a proud member because I learned and I contributed in earning good reviews and making our guests happy.

Some how the some partners all what they cared about was the money to be banked to their accounts by the end of the month and not to care at all about this place. As for us (Me and My fiance) this is our little world. 

And now we have got the opportunity to buy off the rest of the shares and we are struggling to find the money for that. Since we are in business we hardly comply with what banks need hence which is why it is hard to apply for a loan.

We need approximately about US$ 7,000 to buy the shares which in Sri Lankan Rupees 450,000/- per share. And the rest to make some upgrades and modifications. 

Each and every valuable person who contributes (depending on the contribution) gets to stay at The Residence Nilaveli for Free of Charge with Breakfast. ;) 

Even if we don't make the whole amount needed before the deadline we will still pay what ever we have collected to the partners so that at least that amount is reduced from the total cost.

As you can see on Booking.com, Agoda and Trip Adviser I worked really hard for 7 months to bring up this place up to this standard, I learned how to cook delicious meals, I learned how to make and keep every one happy and positive because even though this is a business this is also my world, what I always dreamed of. And I so badly want to own this place 100% so that I can start a family and grow and also to help my Mom, Dad and my baby sisters to be successful. This is a one in a lifetime chance for me. Also I do not want any one else to be partners because depends on their mentalities I cannot risk any one ruining what I built up so far. 

http://www.booking.com/hotel/lk/the-residence-nilaveli.en-gb.html?sid=5c06839748469a0f154e1836e805e6cb;dcid=4;dist=0&type=total&#tab-reviews

"You don't always win your battle but it's good to know that you fought!" - Lauren Bacall 

Contributing or not thank you for the precious time you took to read my story!

Love to all,

Liza

story:
What is pingg?

pingg is the next generation of micro social networking apps that provides users with a new innovative way for local user to user connections and business to consumer connections in their immediate areas.  

Users are able to see other pingg users and local businesses in their current geotagged area.  The visible users are characterized by their first name and their job titles as listed on LinkedIn and/or Facebook.

pingg allows users to connect with other users to start a dialog or conversation.  The app also connects them to instant time sensitive deals by small businesses in their immediate local area. 

Local businesses are able to directly connect with their targeted local customers, allowing them to instantly offer time sensitive deals or specials!

How it works...

Users sign in to pingg using their LinkedIn OR Facebook credentials allowing a seamless and effortless signup. Our users are encouraged to add more information in their individual profiles. 

Once logged in, users are able to see other users within a small radius to initiate a conversation, as well as being able to see local business specials/deals within a local radius.  

pingg is about meeting new people and discovering small businesses in your immediate area no matter where you are!

Our app features a real time posting method that allows users and business to post instant deals OR community announcement with pictures (ie lost dog, special event, playing a gig at a local bar) and be visible to anyone in your immediate area for two hours. No need to present vouchers, just mention you saw it on pingg.

Just bought a new TV? Sell your old one immediately by posting on pingg. Once you post, a notification will be displayed on every users phone in the nearby area allowing for an instant sale!

pingg is currently developed for IOS (Apple iPhone) however, we plan on expanding to Android in the very near future.

What We Need 

We are looking for assistance to finish the app and move our code to a secure database.  We want to attend the Collision Conference in Las Vegas, NV on May 5th where we can network and get the word out about pingg.  Our goal is to attend the next start up conference in fall 2015 but we need a fully working app to be considered.  We are currently in the beta testing phase and need to raise funds to acquire new equipment needed.  We will be in the iPhone app store within 2 months if we reach the required funding. 

The Impact

We are helping neighborhoods become a community of open conversation.  We believe we miss out on connections because we are just not aware of the people around us. Get to know who's around you! 
We also support small businesses who may not have the marketing budget to advertise.  We provide them a cost effective way to be heard and develop local support from their neighborhood as well as people just visiting the area.

Ways You Can Help

Many great ideas have been lost throughout time because there wasn't enough support to help them materialize.  This is why we are taking the crowdfunding approach.  We feel we have a great idea that will develop into something amazing and know with your help we can get there!
We have a focused marketing plan that is destined to take us to the next level.  We understand not everyone is able to contribute to this project, however if you like the concept try it out!  pingg will be in the App Store within the next few months.  
If you have any questions regarding pingg or how you can get involved feel free to contact us!

story:
What is Farmshare Austin 

Farmshare Austin is an innovative 501(c)3 that envisions a future of resilient local food economies that provide farmers with livable incomes, value the resources needed to farm, and ensure organic food access.  We take a whole systems approach to community food security by training organic farmers, improving farm practices, preserving farmland, and increasing access to organic food.

October 2014 we launched Farmer Starter, an intensive residential course where students live and work on our educational farm in eastern Travis County, just eighteen miles from downtown Austin. The mission of the program is to grow more farmers in order to strengthen local food systems.  Students learn about the science, theory, and business of farming while gaining experience working on the educational farm. The curriculum is accentuated with workshops that cover some of the diverse skills that are needed around a farm like carpentry and mechanics. The program also includes field trips to area farms so students can see a variety of growing methods and scales of production.  

Most of the produce grown on the farm is used to support Farmshare Austin’s food access projects with partnering non-profit organizations. These non-profit partners include the Sustainable Food Center, El Buen Samaritano, and Safe Place. Farmshare also works with the City of Austin and the University of Texas School of Public Health to supply produce to the Farm to Family community farm stands program. The food access strategy helps to put fresh healthy food in the hands of people who may otherwise lack the means to purchase organic fruits and vegetables. Farmer Starter students also gain experience in the community by working with partnering non-profit organizations to serve low-income and access-challenged people.

Why Farmer Starter Matters

Aspiring farmers without a traditional background in agriculture have a lot to learn in order to succeed, and Farmshare Austin will give them the foundation necessary to begin realizing their goals and will connect them to a community of local growers. Farmer Starter graduates will play a critical role in Central Texas' food system. The demand for high-quality local produce is increasing just as many farmers are nearing retirement. Training the next generation of organic vegetable farmers is essential for the health of people in the region and the businesses that rely on the availability of these products.  

What Farmer Starter Needs

Farmershare Austin needs to raise $38,500 this summer to complete our campus and give our students the best possible experience when they start this fall. We need:

  • A dedicated office and classroom space with furnishings
  • A new cooler for the wash and pack shed 
  • A composting toilet, designed and constructed with the help of the Greater Austin chapter of Engineers Without Boarders

What You Get

When you contribute to Farmshare Austin, you become part an exclusive group of people who work tirelessly to ensure that Central Texas has a dynamic, healthy food system for generations to come. The perks for this campaign, described on the right, are designed to welcome you into this community and express our appreciation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t give to this campaign we need your help! Please share the campaign with your networks and use the Indiegogo share tools. You can also sign up for our newsletter at farmshareaustin.org/connect and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for information on our programs, events, and volunteer opportunities.

story:
Short Summary

The Houston Climbing Club is a community-sourced and crowd-funded project to create a 24/7 non-profit climbing facility in inner-loop Houston.  The Club was founded in June to spread the values of Climbing, Sharing, and Fun.  

What We Need

We need more capital to bring this dream to life. By donating you're voting with your dollar; helping bring a new climbing gym into the Eado District.  Our competitive rates get me jazzed.

This project can't be built with sweat and spirit alone.  Capitalism requires capital.  The past few months the team's talked to many excited, enthusiastic, and energetic people,who are crazy about the idea. Support can come from many sources, but right now we're short on dough. 

What You Get

A steal.  Warm feelings for making something happen. You get to help build this, full members are just that full partners in a joint endeavor. Together we can make this happen.

The Impact

With continuing community support and effort, a new gym will be carved out of eado landscape.  By crowdsourcing the business model, we've been able to move quickly. Already members have scouted locations, begun work on CAD designs, set up the legal and political frameworks required, and started to TELL people about this.  

Let's Build This Together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Come to meetings, participate on social media, tell your friends!

story:
Short Summary

I am Darin Hair.  Founder and CEO of DrRater.net. I created this website so people could have a place to go for information on doctors so they could make a better decision on which Doctor to choose.  I have invested over $50,000 in the process of the development and am up and running in Texas right now.  DrRater is already receiving over 1000 hits a month on the website and has over 400 ratings or reviews.  We are off to a good start but I would like to take it nationwide.  Everyone in the U.S should have the chance to use this website.  To get this nationwide it would take another $75,000.  If the goal is not reached then we will expand state to state until we get nationwide.  The premise behind this website is that people have a right to know what kind of experiences other people have had at a  Doctor's office.  I also feel it is important for Doctors to know what kind of experiences his or her patients are having.

The contributions will go to upgrading servers and buying the data for doctors info so we can expand beyond Texas.

This is something that can benefit everyone!  Doctors and patients alike. Anything you can give will be used to better the website experience. If you can't help please share the word!  The sooner the better!

Social media is one of our biggest tools we use.

Follow us on Twitter : DrRater.net Twitter

Like us on Facebook : DrRater.net Facebook

Google + : DrRater.net Google+

story:
Have you ever wanted to collect a bunch of awesome gifts to bring smiles to at-risk and homeless youth in your community alongside your friends and family? Have you ever wanted to physically give these gifts out and witness the smiles first hand? Join Heroes In Black on a mission to collect and hand out gifts on Christmas morning to over 6000 at-risk and homeless youth, as well as expecting young mothers and their children currently living in shelters, group homes and community housing across the GTA.

If you’re not able to make the event and just want to donate to this great cause, you can do that here. 

All donations will go towards gifts from our Holiday Wish List below for youth 0-24 years of age.

Drop off and pick ups are available.

Event details are here: https://www.facebook.com/events/1728392724055913/#

Tickets for this event are availiable here: https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/holiday-heroes-tickets-19384546…

To stay up to date with all our events, please like our Facebook page, then click events and then click subscribe: www.facebook.com/heroesinblack

Please email us at heroesinblack@gmail.com if you need to reach us directly and someone will get back to you within 48 hours.

Holiday Wish List:

- Winter Clothes/Jackets For Ages 0-24

- Baby Formula/Food

- Diapers (All-Sizes)

- Baby Wipes

- Giftcards

- Books/Journals

- Underwear/Socks

- Backpacks/School Supplies

- Toys ages 0-24

- Blankets/Pillows

- Instruments

- Hygiene Products

- Art Supplies

**100% of your contribution will go directly towards youth in need across the GTA. Give generously this Holiday season and join us on a mission to turn frowns upside down.**

**Any extra donations will go towards even more gifts**

For more information please visit: Heroesinblack.ca
